text: Stellantis N.V. is a car manufacturing company formed from the merger in 2021 of the Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA) and the PSA Group. Stellantis designs, manufactures and sells cars of 14 brands: Opel, Peugeot, CitroÃ«n, Alfa Romeo, Jeep, Dodge, Fiat, Chrysler, Maserati, Lancia, Vauxhall, DS, Ram Trucks and Abarth. == Other websites == * Category:2021 establishments in Europe Category:2020s establishments in the Netherlands Category:Automobile companies Category:Transport companies of the Netherlands
title: Stellantis
